attributes.action: Bring out a law to ban kids from riding in supermarket trolleys.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Visiting supermarkets, and seeing kids riding in the supermarket trolley is wrong!
It is unhygienic. These trolleys are for putting food in, not kids who are to lazy to walk. 
The germs on the bottom of the shoes, and also may be dog poo.
Supermarkets should be made to put a notice on every trolley forbidden children to ride in them.
Lets put a stop to it now.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
